overview: Old houses lined up in eaves, houses leaning by the weight of life that were not repaired for 50 or 100 years and flowed。Building manager houses and epidermis houses that have been disturbed around the factory with industrial development are now slammed by only low-yield people。  The slum district called the so-called Doya city。However, the people living in these districts are also well-meaning people who wish to work together and work on their lives。I'm trying to get a better life。A slum that reiterates those efforts and the development of the land。The camera moves inside the slum。
title: Slum
